name: Hot Chicken Sandwiches II
author: SUE202
summary: I added the dressing and now myself and daughters are asked to bring this to potlucks - constantly!  I don't especially care for 'regular' shredded chicken sandwiches, but really like MY version.
ingredients: 1 (50 ounce) can whole cooked chicken, drained, bones and skin removed
2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (8 ounce) package dry bread stuffing mix
directions: Shred chicken, and place in a large pot or slow cooker
Stir in the seasoning mix from the stuffing, and then stir in the dry stuffing mix
Cook over medium heat until heated through
